title.value: Развитие плодоводства Республики Беларусь в 2004-2011 гг. и задачи 2012 года
Fruit growing development of the Republic of Belarus during 2004-2011. Tasks for 2012

person.name: Samus, V.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: During 2004-2011 15.7 thousand hectares of orchards and small fruit plantations were planted 1 in agricultural enterprises and farmsteads of the Republic of Belarus. Creation of native primary areas of processing enterprises at the territory of 700 hectares has started. The Republic becomes able to provide itself by its own planting material of fruit and small fruit cultures and strawberry plants. The release of 3 horticultural tractor modifications 'Belarus' as well as of 20 specialized machinery items for fruit growing has been adjusted. Fruit store houses of total capacity of 77.3 thousand tons are set in operation. Further industry development will be carried out within the framework of (lie Stale-programme of potato, vegetable and fruit growing complex development for 2011 2015. It will let to reach fruit and berry production level up to NSO thousand tons by 2012.
